00028 class BdkOnResNLLYields : public RooAbsReal {
00029 public:
00030   // Static members:
00031 
00032   enum SystBit {EFF = 1, BRDK = 2, BR3PIoverK2PI = 4, BRK2PI = 8, NBB = 16,
00033                 ALL = 1+2+4+8+16};
00034 
00035   // signal efficiency:
00036   double efficiency() {
00037     return (_pdf ? _pdf->absoluteEff()->getVal() : 0);}
00038   double efficiencyRelErr() {
00039     return (_pdf ? _pdf->absoluteEff()->getError()/efficiency() : 0);}
00040 
00041   // B -> DK
00042   double BRBtoDK() {
00043     return (_pdf ? _pdf->brBtoDK()->getVal() : 0);}
00044   double BRBtoDKRelErr() {
00045     return (_pdf ? _pdf->brBtoDK()->getError()/BRBtoDK() : 0);}
00046 
00047   // D -> Kpipi0
00048   double BRDtoK2pi() {
00049     return (_pdf ? _pdf->brDtoK2pi()->getVal() : 0);}
00050   double BRDtoK2piRelErr() {
00051     return (_pdf ? _pdf->brDtoK2pi()->getError()/BRDtoK2pi() : 0);}
00052 
00053   // (D -> pi pi pi)/(D -> K pi pi)
00054   double BRDto3piOverK2pi() {
00055     return (_pdf ? _pdf->brDto3piOverK2pi()->getVal() : 0);}
00056   double BRDto3piOverK2piRelErr() {
00057     return (_pdf ? _pdf->brDto3piOverK2pi()->getError()/BRDto3piOverK2pi() : 0);}
00058 
00059   double nBBRelErr() {
00060     return (_pdf ? _pdf->nBB()->getError()/_pdf->nBB()->getVal() : 0);}
00061 
00062 
00063   // instance members:
00064 public:
00065   BdkOnResNLLYields(BdkPdfOnRes & pdf, 
00066                     double corrNsigAsym,
00067                     int systBit = EFF + BRDK + BR3PIoverK2PI + BRK2PI + NBB);
00068 
00069   virtual ~BdkOnResNLLYields();
00070 
00071   virtual TObject* clone(const char* newname) const; // RooAbsArg pure virtual
00072 
00073   // Modifiers:
00074   void setVerbose(const char * v) {_verbose = v; _verbose.ToLower();}
00075 
00076   // Accessors:
00077 
00078   // evaluate() returns half the chi^2, and the ErrorLevel (or ErrDef) is
00079   // as in RooNLLVar, so this class can be used together with RooNLLVar.
00080   virtual Double_t evaluate() const;
00081   virtual Double_t defaultErrorLevel() const {return 0.5;} 
00082 
00083   BdkPdfOnRes * pdf() {return _pdf;}
00084 
00085   double errNsigAsym() const {return _errNsigAsym;}  
00086   double noCPNsig() const {return _noCPNsig;}
00087   double noCPNsigRelErr() const {return _noCPNsigRelErr;}
00088   double nsig() const {return _nsig;}
00089   double asym() const {return _asym;}
00090   double nsigErr() const {return _nsigErr;}
00091   double asymErr() const {return _asymErr;}
00092 
00093   double expectedNsigP() const;
00094   double expectedNsigN() const;
00095   
00096   double expectedNsig() const;
00097   double expectedAsym() const;
00098 
00099   virtual void printToStream(ostream& os, 
00100                              PrintOption opt=Standard, 
00101                              TString indent= "") const;  
00102 
00103   void printParams(ostream & os) const;
00104 
00105   const TString & verbose() const {return _verbose;}
